page.title: 08HEATON MANOR SCHOOL
page.content:
A split site Comprehensive.
Heaton Manor School is a school which is split up into two different sites. The two schools are approximately one and a half miles apart. The two sites are called 'Jesmond' and 'Benton' and now have better facilities.
Most kids did not like it at first because they thought there would be trouble but now it is much beter than it was before. People from both schools have made more friends.
Years 1 and 2 are at Jesmond. Yars 3-5 are at Benton. If you wish to stay on to the sixth Form you leave Benton and return to Jesmond. the teachers have to travel back and forward from site to site every day to teach lessons.
